extension.news: v1.1.3 - Better support for v18 Leia - Fix so script only backups user defined keymaps if trying to save new keymap file - Moved all text into language file for easier internationalization
extension.description: Keymap Editor is a GUI for configuring mappings for remotes, keyboard and other inputs supported by Kodi. Note: existing user defined key mappings will be renamed to .bak.
